00068 void macsixlowpanDataRequest(u16 addr, u8 len, u8 * data);

00073 uint8_t * mac_ptr;
00074 
00078 uint8_t mac_hdr_len;
00079 
00083 #define NUM_PREFIXES 2
00084 
00085 #define PRINTF(x)
00086 
00087 #define FRAG_BUF               ((struct sixlowpan_frag_hdr *)mac_ptr)
00088 #define HC1_BUF                ((struct sixlowpan_hc1_hdr *)(mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len))
00089 #define HC1_HC_UDP_BUF  ((struct sixlowpan_hc1_hc_udp_hdr *)(mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len))
00090 #define IP_BUF                         ((struct uip_ip_hdr *)(mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len))
00091 #define IPHC_BUF              ((struct sixlowpan_iphc_hdr *)(mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len))
00092 
00093 #define UIP_ND6_RS_BUF            ((struct uip_nd6_rs *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN])
00094 #define UIP_ND6_RA_BUF            ((struct uip_nd6_ra *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN])
00095 
00096 #define UIP_ND6_NS_BUF            ((struct uip_nd6_ns *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN])
00097 #define UIP_ND6_NA_BUF            ((struct uip_nd6_na *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN])
00098 
00099 #define UIP_ND6_OPT_LLAO_LEN 8
00100 
00101 #define UIP_ND6_OPT_HDR_BUF  ((struct uip_nd6_opt_hdr *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN + nd6_opt_offset])
00102 #define UIP_ND6_OPT_PREFIX_BUF ((struct uip_nd6_opt_prefix_info *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len + UIP_ICMPH_LEN + nd6_opt_offset])
00103 
00104 #define UIP_ICMP_BUF            ((struct uip_icmp_hdr *)&mac_buf[mac_hdr_len])
00105 
00106 #define HTONS(n) (u16_t)((((u16_t) (n)) << 8) | (((u16_t) (n)) >> 8))
00107 
00109 uint8_t mac_buf[127];
00110 
00112 static struct uip_nd6_opt_llao *nd6_opt_llao;
00113 
00115 static u8_t *hc01_ptr;
00116 
00117 static uint16_t * hc01_chksum_ptr;
00118 
00119 static uint16_t udpLocalAddr;
00120 
00121 static u16_t chksum(u16_t sum, const u8_t *data, u16_t len);
00122 
00123 uint8_t mac_len;
00124 
00126 sixlowpan_prefix_t context_prefix[NUM_PREFIXES];
00127 
00128 extern void ledoff1(void);
00129 
00130 #define NO_CONTEXT 0xff
00131 
00132 uint8_t use_context = NO_CONTEXT;

00139 void sixlowpan_init(void)
00140 {
00141     context_prefix[0].checksum = 0xfe80;
00142     context_prefix[0].is_used = 1;
00143 
00144     sixlowpanSleep_init();
00145 }

00172 void sixlowpan_hc01_process(void)
00173 {
00174     ipbuf_t ipbuf;
00175 
00176     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00177     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00178 
00179     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00180 
00181     /* Dest address based on MAC address, Version, Flow, Traffic compressed */
00182     if ((IPHC_BUF->dispatch == SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC) &&
00183        ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x0C) ==  SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_0))
00184     {
00185 
00186         /* Version & Flow Uncompressed */
00187         if ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x40) == 0)
00188         {
00189             if((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x80) == 0)
00190             {
00191                 /* Traffic class is carried inline */
00192                 hc01_ptr += 4;
00193             }
00194             else
00195             {
00196                 /* Traffic class is compressed */
00197                 hc01_ptr += 3;
00198             }
00199 
00200             /* Version & Flow Compressed */
00201         }
00202         else
00203         {
00204             if((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x80) == 0)
00205             {
00206                 /* Traffic class is carried inline */
00207                 hc01_ptr += 1;
00208             }
00209             else
00210             {
00211                 /* Traffic class is compressed */
00212                 ;
00213             }
00214         }
00215 
00216         /* Next-header field */
00217         if (IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_NH_C)
00218         {
00219             ipbuf.proto = UIP_PROTO_UDP; /* Currently only UDP compressed like that */
00220         }
00221         else
00222         {
00223             ipbuf.proto = *hc01_ptr;
00224             hc01_ptr++;
00225         }
00226 
00227         /* Remember location of TTL */
00228         ipbuf.ttlptr = hc01_ptr;
00229 
00230         /* Check TTL */
00231         switch (IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x18)
00232         {
00233             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_1:
00234                 ipbuf.ttl = 1;
00235                 break;
00236             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64:
00237                 ipbuf.ttl = 64;
00238                 break;
00239             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_255:
00240                 ipbuf.ttl = 255;
00241                 break;
00242             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_I:
00243                 ipbuf.ttl = *hc01_ptr;
00244                 hc01_ptr += 1;
00245                 break;
00246         }
00247 
00248         /* Destination address is context-based */
00249         ipbuf.destcontext = (IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x03);
00250 
00251         /* Source address could be anything (off-link even) */
00252         ipbuf.srcmode = (IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0xC0) >> 4;
00253         ipbuf.srccontext = (IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x30) >> 4;
00254 
00255         /* We will just use source address as destination when sending
00256          * anything back out, hence we never store the address. It will
00257          * automatically be at the proper place in the packet. */
00258         ipbuf.srcptr = hc01_ptr;
00259 
00260         switch (ipbuf.srcmode)
00261         {
00262             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_0: /* Note: we use 'DAM' constants instead of 'SAM'
00263                                         * since address mode is shifted right 4 in this var */
00264                 break;
00265             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_16:
00266                 if((*hc01_ptr & 0x80) == 0)
00267                 {
00268                     /* unicast address */
00269                     hc01_ptr += 2;
00270                 }
00271                 else
00272                 {
00273                     PRINTF("sixlowpan: Don't deal with multicast\n");
00274                     return;
00275                 }
00276                 break;
00277             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_64:
00278                 hc01_ptr += 8;
00279                 break;
00280             case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I:
00281                 hc01_ptr += 16;
00282                 break;
00283         }
00284 
00285         mac_hdr_len = hc01_ptr - mac_buf;
00286         ipbuf.mac_hdr_len = mac_hdr_len;
00287 
00288         /********** ICMP Message **********/
00289         if (ipbuf.proto == UIP_PROTO_ICMP6)
00290         {
00291             if (UIP_ICMP_BUF->type == ICMP6_ECHO_REQUEST)
00292             {
00293                 LED_ON(1);
00294                 macSetAlarm(LED_DELAY,ledoff1);
00295 
00296                 mac_hdr_len = 0;
00297 
00298                 /* Check if TTL is carried inline, we reset it to 64 if so... */
00299                 if ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x18) == SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_I)
00300                 {
00301                    *(mac_ptr + 4) = 64;
00302                 }
00303 
00304 
00305                 /* Send packet back to source */
00306                 IPHC_BUF->encoding[1]  = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0 | (ipbuf.destcontext << 4);
00307                 IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= ipbuf.srcmode | ipbuf.srccontext;
00308 
00309                 mac_hdr_len = ipbuf.mac_hdr_len;
00310 
00311                 /* Send echo reply */
00312                 UIP_ICMP_BUF->type = ICMP6_ECHO_REPLY;
00313 
00314                 /* We cheat the checksum since we just changed echo request to echo reply... */
00315                 UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum + ~(HTONS(0x0000));
00316 
00317                 sixlowpanSleep_activity();
00318                 macsixlowpanDataRequest(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, mac_len, mac_buf);
00319             }
00320 
00321             if (UIP_ICMP_BUF->type == ICMP6_ECHO_REPLY)
00322             {
00323                 sixlowpan_ping_usercall(*(hc01_ptr + 7));
00324             }
00325 
00326             if (UIP_ICMP_BUF->type == ICMP6_RA)
00327             {
00328                 sixlowpan_hc01_process_ra(&ipbuf);
00329             }
00330 
00331             if (UIP_ICMP_BUF->type == ICMP6_NS)
00332             {
00333                 /* Destination is sender */
00334                 ipbuf.destcontext = ipbuf.srccontext;
00335                 ipbuf.destmode = ipbuf.srcmode;
00336 
00337                 /* Source context will be same */
00338                 sixlowpan_hc01_gen_na(&ipbuf, 1);
00339             }
00340         }
00341 
00342         /********** UDP Message **********/
00343         if (ipbuf.proto == UIP_PROTO_UDP)
00344         {
00345             /* Figure out port, while swapping src/dest */
00346             uint16_t srcport, destport;
00347 
00348             if (*hc01_ptr == SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_C)
00349             {
00350                 hc01_ptr++;
00351 
00352                 srcport = (*hc01_ptr >> 4) + SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN;
00353                 destport = (*hc01_ptr & 0x0f) + SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN;
00354 
00355                 /* Swap nibbles */
00356                 uint8_t temp;
00357                 temp = *hc01_ptr >> 4;
00358                 temp |= ((*hc01_ptr) & 0x0f) << 4;
00359 
00360                 /* Store swapped dest/src */
00361                 *hc01_ptr = temp;
00362 
00363                 hc01_ptr++;
00364 
00365                 mac_hdr_len += 2;
00366 
00367             }
00368             else if (*hc01_ptr == SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_I)
00369             {
00370                 srcport = HTONS(*((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 1)));
00371                 destport = HTONS(*((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 3)));
00372 
00373                 /* Store swapped dest/src ports */
00374                 *((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 1)) = HTONS(destport);
00375                 *((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 3)) = HTONS(srcport);
00376 
00377                 hc01_ptr += 5;
00378                 mac_hdr_len += 5;
00379 
00380             }
00381             else
00382             {
00383                 return;
00384             }
00385 
00386             hc01_chksum_ptr = (uint16_t *)hc01_ptr;
00387 
00388             /* Add checksum of source and destination */
00389             *hc01_chksum_ptr = srcport + destport;
00390 
00391             /* Check for overflow... */
00392             if ((*hc01_chksum_ptr < srcport) || (*hc01_chksum_ptr < destport))
00393             {
00394                 (*hc01_chksum_ptr)++;
00395             }
00396 
00397             hc01_ptr += 2;
00398             mac_hdr_len += 2;
00399 
00400             /* Calculate maximum allowed payload */
00401             uint8_t maxPayload;
00402             maxPayload = 113 - mac_hdr_len; /* RUM allows 113 byte payloads */
00403 
00404             /* Call user program */
00405             uint8_t userdata;
00406             userdata = sixlowpan_udp_usercall(srcport, destport, hc01_ptr,
00407                                   mac_len - mac_hdr_len, maxPayload, &ipbuf);
00408 
00409             /* If user wants to send data out, do so */
00410             if (userdata)
00411             {
00412                 ipbuf.mac_hdr_len = mac_hdr_len;
00413                 mac_hdr_len = 0;
00414 
00415                /* Reset TTL */
00416                if ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x18) == SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_I)
00417                {
00418                    *(ipbuf.ttlptr) = 64;
00419                }
00420                else
00421                {
00422                     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = (IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & ~(0x18)) | SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64;
00423                }
00424 
00425                /* Send packet back to source */
00426                 IPHC_BUF->encoding[1]  = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0 | (ipbuf.destcontext << 4); //New Source
00427                 IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= ipbuf.srcmode | ipbuf.srccontext;                //New Dest
00428 
00429                 mac_hdr_len = ipbuf.mac_hdr_len;
00430 
00431                 /* Figure out new UDP packet length */
00432                 mac_len = userdata + mac_hdr_len;
00433 
00434                 /* Send over radio */
00435                 sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send();
00436             }
00437         }
00438     }
00439 }
00440 
00449 void sixlowpan_hc01_process_ra(ipbuf_t * ipbuf)
00450 {
00451     struct uip_nd6_opt_prefix_info * nd6_opt_prefix_info;
00452     uint8_t nd6_opt_offset;
00453 
00454     /* Very basic sanity check */
00455     if (ipbuf->ttl != 255) return;
00456 
00457     /* Find prefix option */
00458     nd6_opt_offset = UIP_ND6_RA_LEN;
00459 
00460     while ((mac_hdr_len + 4 + nd6_opt_offset) < mac_len)
00461     {
00462         if(UIP_ND6_OPT_HDR_BUF->len == 0)
00463         {
00464             return;
00465         }
00466 
00467         /* Is this option prefix option? */
00468         if (UIP_ND6_OPT_HDR_BUF->type == UIP_ND6_OPT_PREFIX_INFO)
00469         {
00470             nd6_opt_prefix_info = (struct uip_nd6_opt_prefix_info *)UIP_ND6_OPT_HDR_BUF;
00471 
00472             uint8_t i = 1;
00473 
00474             uint16_t prefixchecksum;
00475 
00476             prefixchecksum = chksum(0, nd6_opt_prefix_info->prefix, 16);
00477 
00478             /* We only ever need to store the checksum of the prefix - no need
00479              * to ever know. We need the checksum for adding in the ICMP checksum */
00480             if (!context_prefix[i].is_used)
00481             {
00482                 context_prefix[i].checksum = prefixchecksum;
00483                 context_prefix[i].is_used = 1;
00484 
00485                 use_context = i;
00486             }
00487 
00488 /* This code can send unsolicited RA's - however it's of no real use in this network */
00489 #if 0
00490             /* We have an IP address associated with this context - we should advertise it
00491              * since we can avoid needing to store it this way.
00492              */
00493             if (prefixchecksum == context_prefix[i].checksum)
00494             {
00495                 ipbuf_t ipbuf;
00496                 ipbuf.destcontext = 0;
00497                 ipbuf.destmode = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_16;
00498                 ipbuf.srccontext = i;
00499                 ipbuf.srcmode = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00500 
00501                 /* Destination is all-routers multicast address */
00502                 /* 3 first bits = 101 */
00503                 mac_buf[4] = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_MCAST_RANGE | (0x02) << 1;
00504                 /* bits 3-6 = scope = bits 8-11 in 128 bits address */
00505 
00506                 /*
00507                  * bits 7 - 15 = 9-bit group
00508                  * All-routers group
00509                  */
00510                  mac_buf[5] = 0x02;
00511 
00512                 uint8_t * targetptr;
00513 
00514                 ipbuf.mac_hdr_len = 6;
00515 
00516                 /* 4 is length of HC01 header, 4 is length between ICMP and target */
00517                 targetptr = &mac_buf[UIP_ICMPH_LEN + ipbuf.mac_hdr_len + 4];
00518 
00519                 uint8_t j;
00520                 /* Copy prefix lower in memory. The RA will always be longer than the NS, so
00521                  * this will always work */
00522                 for(j = 0; j < 8; j++) {
00523                     *targetptr = nd6_opt_prefix_info->prefix[j];
00524                     targetptr++;
00525                 }
00526 
00527                 /* Setup our address */
00528                 *targetptr++ = MSB(macConfig.panId) | 0x02;
00529                 *targetptr++ = LSB(macConfig.panId);
00530                 *targetptr++ = 0x00;
00531                 *targetptr++ = 0xff;
00532                 *targetptr++ = 0xfe;
00533                 *targetptr++ = 0x00;
00534                 *targetptr++ = MSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00535                 *targetptr++ = LSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00536 
00537                 /* Setup rest of NA crapola */
00538                 sixlowpan_hc01_gen_na(&ipbuf, 0);
00539 
00540             }
00541 #endif
00542 
00543                 /* Only check first prefix we find... */
00544                 break;
00545             }
00546 
00547         nd6_opt_offset += (UIP_ND6_OPT_HDR_BUF->len << 3);
00548     }
00549 }
00550 
00563 void sixlowpan_hc01_gen_na(ipbuf_t * ipbuf, uint8_t solicited)
00564 {
00565     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00566     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00567 
00568 
00569     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00570 
00571     IPHC_BUF->dispatch = SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC;
00572     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = 0;
00573     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] = 0;
00574 
00575     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C;
00576     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C;
00577 
00578     *hc01_ptr = UIP_PROTO_ICMP6;
00579     hc01_ptr += 1;
00580 
00581     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_255;
00582 
00583     /* Source IP address */
00584     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= (ipbuf->srccontext) << 4;
00585     /* elide the IID */
00586     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00587 
00588     /* Destination is sender */
00589     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= ipbuf->destcontext;
00590     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= ipbuf->destmode;
00591 
00592     mac_hdr_len = ipbuf->mac_hdr_len;
00593 
00594     /* Neighbor Advertisement */
00595     UIP_ICMP_BUF->type = ICMP6_NA;
00596     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icode = 0;
00597 
00598     UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->reserved[0] = 0;
00599     UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->reserved[1] = 0;
00600     UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->reserved[2] = 0;
00601 
00602     /* This code sends solicited NA */
00603     if (solicited)
00604     {
00605         UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->flagsreserved = UIP_ND6_NA_FLAG_SOLICITED;
00606     }
00607     else
00608     {
00609         UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->flagsreserved = 0;
00610     }
00611 
00612     /* Need to set the 'UIP_ND6_NA_BUF->tgtipaddr' - BUT since we are sending,
00613      * solicitied responses, this is the same thing as in the NA. This lies at
00614      * the same location in the NA too - we just don't do anything, and magically
00615      * it is set up correctly */
00616 
00617     /* Target Link-Layer Address */
00618     mac_len = UIP_ICMPH_LEN + UIP_ND6_NA_LEN + UIP_ND6_OPT_LLAO_LEN + mac_hdr_len;
00619     nd6_opt_llao = (struct uip_nd6_opt_llao *)&mac_buf[UIP_ICMPH_LEN + UIP_ND6_NA_LEN + mac_hdr_len];
00620     nd6_opt_llao->type = UIP_ND6_OPT_TLLAO; /* type of the option */
00621     nd6_opt_llao->len = 1; /* 8-bytes */
00622     nd6_opt_llao->addr[0] = MSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00623     nd6_opt_llao->addr[1] = LSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00624 
00625     /* Pad with zeros */
00626     uint8_t i;
00627     for(i = 2; i < 6; i++)
00628     {
00629         nd6_opt_llao->addr[i] = 0x00;
00630     }
00631 
00632     /* ICMP Checksum */
00633     /*
00634      * The checksum is the 16-bit one's complement of the one's complement
00635      * sum of the entire ICMPv6 message starting with the ICMPv6 message
00636      * type field, prepended with a "pseudo-header" of IPv6 header fields,
00637      * as specified in [IPv6, section 8.1].
00638      *
00639      */
00640     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = 0;
00641     uint16_t checksum16 = sixlowpan_hc01_pseudochksum();
00642 
00643     /* Sum all the ICMP stuff */
00644     checksum16 = chksum(checksum16, mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len, mac_len - mac_hdr_len);
00645     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = ~HTONS(checksum16);
00646 
00647     sixlowpanSleep_activity();
00648     macsixlowpanDataRequest(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, mac_len, mac_buf);
00649 }
00660 void sixlowpan_hc01_gen_rs(void){
00661 
00662     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00663     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00664 
00665 
00666     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00667 
00668     IPHC_BUF->dispatch = SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC;
00669     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = 0;
00670     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] = 0;
00671 
00672     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C;
00673     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C;
00674 
00675     *hc01_ptr = UIP_PROTO_ICMP6;
00676     hc01_ptr += 1;
00677 
00678     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_255;
00679 
00680     /* Source IP address: Link-local prefix */
00681     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_ADDR_CONTEXT_LL << 4;
00682     /* elide the IID */
00683     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00684 
00685     /* Destination is all-routers multicast address */
00686     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_16;
00687     /* 3 first bits = 101 */
00688     *hc01_ptr = SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_MCAST_RANGE;
00689     /* bits 3-6 = scope = bits 8-11 in 128 bits address */
00690     *hc01_ptr |= (0x02) << 1;
00691     /*
00692      * bits 7 - 15 = 9-bit group
00693      * All-routers group
00694      */
00695     *(hc01_ptr + 1) = 0x02;
00696     hc01_ptr += 2;
00697 
00698     mac_hdr_len = 6;
00699 
00700     /* Router solicitation */
00701     UIP_ICMP_BUF->type = ICMP6_RS;
00702     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icode = 0;
00703     UIP_ND6_RS_BUF->reserved = 0;
00704 
00705     /* Source Link-Layer Address */
00706     mac_len = UIP_ICMPH_LEN + UIP_ND6_RS_LEN + UIP_ND6_OPT_LLAO_LEN + mac_hdr_len;
00707     nd6_opt_llao = (struct uip_nd6_opt_llao *)&mac_buf[UIP_ICMPH_LEN + UIP_ND6_RS_LEN + mac_hdr_len];
00708     nd6_opt_llao->type = UIP_ND6_OPT_SLLAO; /* type of the option */
00709     nd6_opt_llao->len = 1; /* 8-bytes */
00710     nd6_opt_llao->addr[0] = MSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00711     nd6_opt_llao->addr[1] = LSB(macConfig.shortAddress);
00712 
00713     /* Pad with zeros */
00714     uint8_t i;
00715     for(i = 2; i < 6; i++)
00716     {
00717         nd6_opt_llao->addr[i] = 0x00;
00718     }
00719 
00720     /* ICMP Checksum */
00721     /*
00722      * The checksum is the 16-bit one's complement of the one's complement
00723      * sum of the entire ICMPv6 message starting with the ICMPv6 message
00724      * type field, prepended with a "pseudo-header" of IPv6 header fields,
00725      * as specified in [IPv6, section 8.1].
00726      *
00727      */
00728 
00729     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = 0;
00730     uint16_t checksum16 = sixlowpan_hc01_pseudochksum();
00731 
00732     /* Sum all the ICMP stuff */
00733     checksum16 = chksum(checksum16, mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len, mac_len - mac_hdr_len);
00734     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = ~HTONS(checksum16);
00735 
00736 
00737     sixlowpanSleep_activity();
00738     macsixlowpanDataRequest(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, mac_len, mac_buf);
00739 
00740 }
00741 
00770 uint8_t * sixlowpan_hc01_ping_setup_ipglobal(uint8_t sequence)
00771 {
00772     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00773     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00774 
00775     uint8_t * ipptr;
00776 
00777     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00778 
00779     IPHC_BUF->dispatch = SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC;
00780     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = 0;
00781     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] = 0;
00782 
00783     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C;
00784     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C;
00785 
00786     *hc01_ptr = UIP_PROTO_ICMP6;
00787     hc01_ptr += 1;
00788 
00789     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64;
00790 
00791     /* Source IP address: Global prefix */
00792     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= 1 << 4;
00793     /* elide the IID */
00794     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00795 
00796     /* Destination is fancy-boy address */
00797     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I;
00798 
00799     ipptr = hc01_ptr;
00800 
00801     hc01_ptr += 16;
00802     mac_hdr_len = 20;
00803 
00804     /* Send echo reply */
00805     UIP_ICMP_BUF->type = ICMP6_ECHO_REQUEST;
00806     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = 0;
00807     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icode = 0;
00808 
00809     /* ICMP Header */
00810     hc01_ptr += 4;
00811 
00812     *hc01_ptr++ = 0; /* Identifier - not used */
00813     *hc01_ptr++ = 0;
00814 
00815     *hc01_ptr++ = 0; /* Sequence number */
00816     *hc01_ptr++ = sequence;
00817 
00818     /* Just send echo request, no data with it */
00819     mac_len = mac_hdr_len + 8;
00820 
00821     return ipptr;
00822 }
00823 
00831 void sixlowpan_hc01_ping_send(void)
00832 {
00833 
00834     /* Check we have context before doing anything... */
00835     if (use_context == NO_CONTEXT)
00836     {
00837         sixlowpan_hc01_gen_rs();
00838         return;
00839     }
00840 
00841     /* Pseudo-header Checksum */
00842     uint16_t checksum16 = sixlowpan_hc01_pseudochksum();
00843 
00844     /* Sum all the payload */
00845     checksum16 = chksum(checksum16, mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len, mac_len - mac_hdr_len);
00846 
00847     UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = ~HTONS(checksum16);
00848 
00849     /* If result is zero, set to 0xffff */
00850     if (UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum == 0x0000)
00851     {
00852         UIP_ICMP_BUF->icmpchksum = 0xFFFF;
00853     }
00854 
00855     sixlowpanSleep_activity();
00856     macsixlowpanDataRequest(DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR, mac_len, mac_buf);
00857 }
00858 
00886 uint8_t * sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ipglobal(void)
00887 {
00888     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00889     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00890 
00891     uint8_t * ipptr;
00892 
00893     udpLocalAddr = DEFAULT_COORD_ADDR;
00894 
00895     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00896 
00897     IPHC_BUF->dispatch = SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC;
00898     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = 0;
00899     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] = 0;
00900 
00901     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C;
00902     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C;
00903 
00904     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_NH_C;
00905 
00906     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64;
00907 
00908     /* Source IP address: Global prefix */
00909     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= 1 << 4;
00910     /* elide the IID */
00911     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00912 
00913     /* Destination is fancy-boy address */
00914     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I;
00915 
00916     ipptr = hc01_ptr;
00917 
00918     hc01_ptr += 16;
00919     mac_hdr_len = 19;
00920     mac_len = mac_hdr_len;
00921 
00922 
00923     return ipptr;
00924 }

00942 void sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_iplocal(uint16_t addr)
00943 {
00944     mac_hdr_len = 0;
00945     mac_ptr = mac_buf;
00946 
00947     udpLocalAddr = addr;
00948 
00949     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
00950 
00951     IPHC_BUF->dispatch = SIXLOWPAN_DISPATCH_IPHC;
00952     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] = 0;
00953     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] = 0;
00954 
00955     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_VF_C;
00956     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TC_C;
00957 
00958     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_NH_C;
00959 
00960     IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_64;
00961 
00962     /* Source IP address: Global prefix */
00963     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= 1 << 4;
00964     /* elide the IID */
00965     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_SAM_0;
00966 
00967     /* Source IP address: Global prefix */
00968     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= 1;
00969     /* elide the IID */
00970     IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] |= SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_0;
00971 
00972     mac_hdr_len = 3;
00973     mac_len = mac_hdr_len;
00974 
00975     return;
00976 }
00977 
00987 void sixlowpan_hc01_udp_setup_ports(uint16_t srcport, uint16_t destport)
00988 {
00989     /* UDP Port Calculations */
00990     if(srcport  >= SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN &&
00991        srcport  <  SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MAX &&
00992        destport >= SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN &&
00993        destport <  SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MAX)
00994     {
00995         /* we can compress. Copy compressed ports, full chcksum */
00996         *hc01_ptr = SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_C;
00997         *(hc01_ptr + 1) =
00998             (u8_t)((srcport  - SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN) << 4) +
00999             (u8_t)((destport - SIXLOWPAN_UDP_PORT_MIN));
01000 
01001         hc01_ptr += 2;
01002         mac_hdr_len += 2;
01003     }
01004     else
01005     {
01006         /* we cannot compress. Copy uncompressed ports, full chcksum */
01007         *hc01_ptr = SIXLOWPAN_NHC_UDP_I;
01008         *((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 1)) = HTONS(srcport);
01009         *((uint16_t *)(hc01_ptr + 3)) = HTONS(destport);
01010 
01011         hc01_ptr += 5;
01012         mac_hdr_len += 5;
01013     }
01014 
01015     hc01_chksum_ptr = (uint16_t *)hc01_ptr;
01016 
01017     /* Add checksum of source and destination */
01018     *hc01_chksum_ptr = srcport + destport;
01019 
01020     /* Check for overflow... */
01021     if ((*hc01_chksum_ptr < srcport) || (*hc01_chksum_ptr < destport))
01022     {
01023         (*hc01_chksum_ptr)++;
01024     }
01025 
01026     hc01_ptr += 2;
01027     mac_hdr_len += 2;
01028 
01029     mac_len = mac_hdr_len;
01030 }
01031 
01039 void sixlowpan_hc01_udp_send(void)
01040 {
01041     /* Check we have context before doing anything... */
01042     if (use_context == NO_CONTEXT)
01043     {
01044         sixlowpan_hc01_gen_rs();
01045         return;
01046     }
01047 
01048     /* Pseudo-header Checksum */
01049      uint16_t checksum16 = sixlowpan_hc01_pseudochksum();
01050 
01051     /* UDP Header */
01052     uint32_t checksum = *hc01_chksum_ptr;  /* Checksum of ports */
01053     checksum += checksum16;                /* IPv6 Pseudo Checksum */
01054     checksum += mac_len - mac_hdr_len + 8; /* UDP field: payload length including UDP header */
01055 
01056     /* Add carries to 16-bit checksum */
01057     while (checksum & 0xFFFF0000)
01058     {
01059         checksum = (uint16_t)(checksum) + (uint16_t)(checksum >> 16);
01060     }
01061 
01062     checksum16 = checksum;
01063 
01064     /* Sum all the UDP payload */
01065     checksum16 = chksum(checksum16, mac_ptr + mac_hdr_len, mac_len - mac_hdr_len);
01066 
01067     *hc01_chksum_ptr = ~HTONS(checksum16);
01068 
01069     /* If result is zero, set to 0xffff */
01070     if (*hc01_chksum_ptr == 0x0000)
01071     {
01072         *hc01_chksum_ptr = 0xFFFF;
01073     }
01074 
01075     sixlowpanSleep_activity();
01076     macsixlowpanDataRequest(udpLocalAddr, mac_len, mac_buf);
01077 }
01078 
01084 uint8_t * sixlowpan_hc01_udp_get_payloadptr(void)
01085 {
01086     return hc01_ptr;
01087 }
01088 
01092 void sixlowpan_hc01_udp_set_payloadsize(uint8_t size)
01093 {
01094     hc01_ptr += size;
01095     mac_len += size;
01096 }
01097 
01111 uint16_t sixlowpan_hc01_pseudochksum(void)
01112 {
01113     uint32_t checksum = 0;
01114 
01115     uint8_t i;
01116 
01117     uint8_t * hc01_ptr_temp;
01118     uint8_t  mac_hdr_len_temp;
01119 
01120     /* This will be restored at the end */
01121     mac_hdr_len_temp = mac_hdr_len;
01122     hc01_ptr_temp = hc01_ptr;
01123 
01124     hc01_ptr = mac_ptr + 3;
01125     mac_hdr_len = 0;
01126 
01127     /* These don't affect checksum, just location */
01128     /* Version & Flow Uncompressed */
01129     if ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x40) == 0)
01130     {
01131         if((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x80) == 0)
01132         {
01133             /* Traffic class is carried inline */
01134             hc01_ptr += 4;
01135         }
01136         else
01137         {
01138             /* Traffic class is compressed */
01139             hc01_ptr += 3;
01140         }
01141     }
01142     else
01143     /* Version & Flow Compressed */
01144     {
01145         if((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x80) == 0)
01146         {
01147             /* Traffic class is carried inline */
01148             hc01_ptr += 1;
01149         }
01150         else
01151         {
01152             /* Traffic class is compressed */
01153             ;
01154         }
01155     }
01156 
01157     /* Next-header field */
01158     if (IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_NH_C)
01159     {
01160         checksum += UIP_PROTO_UDP; /* Currently only UDP compressed like that */
01161         checksum += 8; /* UDP has 8 bytes in UDP header, this will not be calculated
01162                           properly later when 'upper layer length' is found, so we
01163                           add them here */
01164     }
01165     else
01166     {
01167         checksum += *hc01_ptr;
01168         hc01_ptr++;
01169     }
01170 
01171      /* Source address IID is ALWAYS based on MAC address */
01172      checksum += context_prefix[(IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x30) >> 4].checksum;
01173      checksum += (macConfig.panId | (uint16_t)0x0200);
01174      checksum += 0xfe00;
01175      checksum += 0x00ff;
01176      checksum += macConfig.shortAddress;
01177 
01178      /* Check if TTL is uncompressed... */
01179      if ((IPHC_BUF->encoding[0] & 0x18) == SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_TTL_I)
01180      {
01181         hc01_ptr++;
01182      }
01183 
01184      /* Dest address could be anything... more complicated! */
01185      switch (IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x0C)
01186      {
01187         case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_0:
01188 
01189             /* IID Based on MAC Address */
01190             checksum += context_prefix[(IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x03)].checksum;
01191             checksum += (macConfig.panId | (uint16_t)0x0200);
01192             checksum += 0xfe00;
01193             checksum += 0x00ff;
01194             checksum += 0x0000; /* Router is always address 0 we assume!! */
01195             break;
01196 
01197         case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_16:
01198             if((*hc01_ptr & 0x80) == 0)
01199             {
01200                 /* unicast address */
01201                 checksum += context_prefix[(IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x03)].checksum;
01202                 checksum += (*hc01_ptr << 8) | (*(hc01_ptr + 1));
01203                 hc01_ptr += 2;
01204             }
01205             else
01206             {
01207                 /* Multicast address - we just assume we know the multicast group */
01208                 checksum += 0xFF00;
01209                 checksum += ((*hc01_ptr >> 1) & 0x0F);
01210                 checksum += *(hc01_ptr + 1);
01211                 hc01_ptr += 2;
01212             }
01213             break;
01214         case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_64:
01215               /* Add lower 64-bits */
01216             checksum += context_prefix[(IPHC_BUF->encoding[1] & 0x03)].checksum;
01217             for(i = 0; i < 8; i += 2)
01218             {
01219                 checksum += (uint16_t)(*(hc01_ptr + i) << 8) + (uint16_t)(*(hc01_ptr + i + 1));
01220             }
01221 
01222             hc01_ptr += 8;
01223             break;
01224         case SIXLOWPAN_IPHC_DAM_I:
01225             for(i = 0; i < 16; i += 2)
01226             {
01227                 checksum += (uint16_t)(*(hc01_ptr + i) << 8) + (uint16_t)(*(hc01_ptr + i + 1));
01228             }
01229             hc01_ptr += 16;
01230             break;
01231     }
01232 
01233     /* Restore pointer */
01234     hc01_ptr = hc01_ptr_temp;
01235     mac_hdr_len =  mac_hdr_len_temp;
01236 
01237      /* Upper length packet length */
01238      checksum += mac_len - mac_hdr_len;
01239 
01240     /* Add carries to 16-bit checksum */
01241     while (checksum & 0xFFFF0000)
01242     {
01243         checksum = (uint16_t)(checksum) + (uint16_t)(checksum >> 16);
01244     }
01245 
01246     return (uint16_t)checksum;
01247 
01248 }
01249 
01259 static u16_t
01260 chksum(u16_t sum, const u8_t *data, u16_t len)
01261 {
01262     u16_t t;
01263     const u8_t *dataptr;
01264     const u8_t *last_byte;
01265 
01266     dataptr = data;
01267     last_byte = data + len - 1;
01268 
01269     while(dataptr < last_byte)
01270     {   /* At least two more bytes */
01271         t = (dataptr[0] << 8) + dataptr[1];
01272         sum += t;
01273 
01274         if(sum < t)
01275         {
01276             sum++;      /* carry */
01277         }
01278 
01279         dataptr += 2;
01280     }
01281 
01282     if(dataptr == last_byte)
01283     {
01284         t = (dataptr[0] << 8) + 0;
01285         sum += t;
01286 
01287         if(sum < t)
01288         {
01289             sum++;      /* carry */
01290         }
01291     }
01292 
01293     /* Return sum in host byte order. */
01294     return sum;
01295 }
01296 
01300 void sixlowpan_DataIndication(ftData *frame, uint8_t payloadlen)
01301 {
01302     sixlowpanSleep_activity();
01303 
01304     memcpy(mac_buf, frame->payload, payloadlen);
01305 
01306     mac_len = payloadlen;
01307     sixlowpan_hc01_process();
01308 
01309     return;
01310 }

01314 void sixlowpan_DataIndication(ftData *frame, uint8_t payloadlen)
01315 {
01316 }
